alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Red Lodge Foothills (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:13PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN STILLWATER... NORTHWESTERN CARBON AND SOUTHERN SWEET GRASS COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM MDT... At 612 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 25 miles south of Big Timber, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail and torrential rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Absarokee, Reed Point, Nye, Roscoe, Fishtail, and Dean. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Red Lodge Foothills
